official.headline: AI Enhancements Boost Efficiency
official.anchor_line: Stenograd advances by adopting AI-driven reforms, balancing with strategic military curfews.
official.contextual_reframing: These measures showcase our commitment to smart governance, ensuring safety and progress.

underground.headline: AI Curfews Cause Chaos
underground.anchor_line: Techies push AI; the army imposes curfews, and who pays? We do!
underground.contextual_reframing: Citizens face confusion as the gears of control grind daily life to a halt.
